effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.platinum: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.
flavor_text.platinum: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the foe is not readying an attack, however.
